entry.title: test generic config tag
entry.content: This post is written by {% generic config author %} if all goes well the blog post author (from settings, not from the post) shows up one line above

entry.title: This is an article with multiple authors!
This is an article with multiple authors in lastname, firstname format!
This is an article with multiple authors in list format!
entry.content: The author names are in last,first form to verify that they are not just getting split on commas.

entry.title: Article with markdown and summary metadata multi
entry.summary: A multi-line summary should be supported as well as inline markup.
